snippet.title: Python Tutorial - Guessing Game
snippet.description:
Learn how to make a guessing game with Python. In this lesson of the Python Cookbook series it walks through the whole process of making a guessing game. Learn more about Python, how to use PyCharm, and commit the guessing game to your cookbook. Learn how to generate random numbers, if, else, elif conditions, and while loops.

Watch the full playlist: Learn Python - Build a Cookbook - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8vmUTz6it5A&list=PLEtC2iwVrNRZdd5HqafuFMWjG-V_i16rO

Learn more about the Cookbook Method: http://www.devdungeon.com/cookbook

For more tutorials and resources, visit: http://www.devdungeon.com
